posts.post_content: I have For Sale (2) T-206`s first Roger Bresnahan Portrait trimmed right to left $75.00. next Izzy Hoffman Providence Polar Bear back seems to measure ok! $100.00 or both for $150.00 delivered. If that's to high make me a good offer!!  If interested pleased email me at [url]mpowers23@verizon.net[/url].  Thanks for Looking!  Marc  SOLD!!!
